recommendations.title: Enhance Call-to-Action Visibility
recommendations.description: Increase the size and contrast of the primary call-to-action button to make it more noticeable.
recommendations.expected_impact: Improves user engagement by making the primary action more apparent, potentially increasing conversions.
recommendations.justification: With no feedback and neutral sentiment, enhancing key interactive elements can drive user action.

before_after.before: The call-to-action button is small and blends with the background.
before_after.after: The call-to-action button is larger and has a contrasting color to stand out.

recommendations.title: Simplify Navigation
recommendations.description: Streamline the navigation menu to reduce cognitive load and make it easier for users to find what they need.
recommendations.expected_impact: Reduces user confusion and improves the overall user journey by making navigation more intuitive.
recommendations.justification: No confusion areas were identified, but simplifying navigation can preemptively address potential user difficulties.

before_after.before: The navigation menu contains multiple links that may overwhelm users.
before_after.after: The navigation menu is simplified with fewer, more clearly labeled links.

implementation_notes: Focus on using existing UI components to make changes. Ensure that any color changes meet accessibility standards.
general_observations: The page currently lacks user feedback, indicating a potential need for more engaging or clearer content to encourage interaction.
